EmailTemplate.name: Global_Product_Webinar_Unstructured Data Session 1.No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: We're sorry we missed you for the Unstructured Data - Video Analytics on Hadoop Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We've Got You Covered. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Sorry we missed you for our second installment of our "What You Can Do With Hadoop" webinar series last week, where we covered unstructured data - video analytics on Hadoop. An on demand broadcast (replay) is available on our website <http://gopivotal.com/resources#http://bitcast-a.v1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotalvideo/Unstructured_Data_Video_Analytics_on_Hadoop_Session_1.m4v>.
If you haven't already, we'd like you to take the opportunity to download Pivotal HD Single Node (VM) <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/data/pivotal-hd#4> and Pivotal HD Community <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/data/pivotal-hd#4>.
With your Pivotal HD Community deployment, we would like to invite you to download HAWQ - the native, mature and fast SQL query engine for Hadoop, which is now freely available for download <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/data/pivotal-hd#4> for a 60-day free trial.
Be a part of the discussion and join our Pivotal HD Discussion Group <http://discuss.gopivotal.com/categories/20112407-Pivotal-HD> and receive support from Pivotal and community experts.
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:info@gopivotal.com>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit our blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/> Pivotal HD Community Forum Join Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/community/pivotal-hd>
